items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Gown. But Order 2 Sizes Up.
items.body: Great Dress!! Wow. This dress so sexy on me according to my husband. Strong Advice: I would order it 2 sizes up. It is in chinese size. So, I had to get this dress reworked by my professional seamstress due how it was sewn by the factory. I did wear it to my daughter's wedding. Everyone loved. Read more
items.author: TELLI

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars bunches in the tummy area
items.body: Love the dress but it bunches in the front and is a tighter in the hips than I would like but will do work for the occasion. Read more
items.author: Bridget Borders

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, well made dress- not stretchy at all
items.body: This dress is beautiful and appears well made, but it is too small, so I will exchange for a larger size. This fabric offers no stretch or "give" so plan for that when choosing your size. I am 5' 3" and even with heels, it is a little long, as expected, and will need to be hemmed. Read more
items.author: b jordan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: Fits perfectly! Quality is very good! Read more
items.author: omar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: Dress is great ! Fits great and looks amazing ! Good material and looks like a good quality dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous quality dress for wedding.
items.body: I’m so happy with this dress! The fit is perfect, and the fabric is high-quality. Halter design is stylish, It’s both classy and comfortable, making it perfect for any formal event. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive Green, Peach, Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Eucalyptus, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Aqua Blue, Royal Blue, Mauve, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
